Plugins.name: 2Hop Links Plus
Plugins.desc: Related links up to 2 hops away are displayed in a card format, allowing for easy browsing through connections between notes. Each card contains a preview of the corresponding note.

Plugins.name: Additional Icons
Plugins.desc: Adds additional iconsets to Obsidian

Plugins.name: Alias Management
Plugins.desc: Identify duplicate notes based on similar aliases and filenames.

Plugins.name: AnyBlock
Plugins.desc: You can flexibility to create a 'Block' by some means. It also provides some useful features, like `list to table`.

Plugins.name: Auto Card Link
Plugins.desc: Automatically fetches metadata from a url and makes it as a card-styled link

Plugins.name: Auto Tasks
Plugins.desc: Combine periodic notes with tags and tasks to automatically manage your daily, weekly and project TODO lists. Requires the Periodic Notes and Tasks plugins.

Plugins.name: Better Comment Toggle
Plugins.desc: Improved comment toggling.

Plugins.name: Better Export PDF
Plugins.desc: Export your notes to PDF, support export preview, add bookmarks outline and header/footer.

Plugins.name: Better footnote
Plugins.desc: Footnote popover for Obsidian

Plugins.name: Better Inline Fields
Plugins.desc: Obsidian plugin to enhance Dataview style inline fields

Plugins.name: Better Markdown Links
Plugins.desc: Adds support for angle bracket links and manages relative links properly

Plugins.name: Better Order List
Plugins.desc: Support new line order list like 1„ÄÅ or (1)., etc.

Plugins.name: Better Reading Mode
Plugins.desc: A plugin to enable better reading mode in Live preview mode of Obsidian, which works similar to bionic reading mode.

Plugins.name: Better Recall
Plugins.desc: Add anki-like spaced repetition and recall to your vault.

Plugins.name: Better Search Views
Plugins.desc: Outliner-like breadcrumb trees for search, backlinks and embedded queries

Plugins.name: Better Word Count
Plugins.desc: Counts the words of selected text in the editor.

Plugins.name: Theme Controller
Plugins.desc: Set when and how the themes will be displayed.

Plugins.name: Block Link Plus
Plugins.desc: Enhances right-click menu and global command with direct links to blocks and titles, adds support for multi-line blockquotes, and offers extensive customization options for block IDs.

Plugins.name: Brain Dump Mode
Plugins.desc: Done is better than perfect. Complete your first-messy-draft before you make it perfect. Your delete key will be DISABLED and all you can do is JUST BURN YOUR KEYBOARDSüî•

Plugins.name: Calendar
Plugins.desc: Calendar view of your daily notes

Plugins.name: CardBoard
Plugins.desc: Display markdown tasks on kanban style boards.

Plugins.name: Colored Tags Wrangler
Plugins.desc: Assign colors to tags. Has integrations with other plugins, like Kanban.

Plugins.name: Colored Text
Plugins.desc: Color the selected texts.

Plugins.name: Enhance Copy Note
Plugins.desc: Augments native Obsidian note copying.

Plugins.name: Image Context Menus
Plugins.desc: Copy to clipboard, Open in default app, Show in system explorer, Reveal file in navigation, Open in new tab context menus for images. Also has an pen PDF externally context menu.

Plugins.name: Create Task
Plugins.desc: Create tasks faster from anywhere.

Plugins.name: Custom Icons
Plugins.desc: Enhance your workspace with customizable icons for documents and folders.

Plugins.name: Customizable Menu
Plugins.desc: Allows you to add any command to Obsidian's right-click menu.

Plugins.name: Tab Switcher
Plugins.desc: Switch your tabs with Ctrl + Tab in recently used order like in a browser.

Plugins.name: Quick Switcher++
Plugins.desc: Enhanced Quick Switcher, search open panels, and symbols.

Plugins.name: Dashboard navigator
Plugins.desc: Vault dashboard and navigator. Show recent files by type, files per day, week, month, search files by name, date, tags and more.

Plugins.name: Easy Typing
Plugins.desc: This plugin aims to enhance and optimize the editing experience in Obsidian

Plugins.name: Editing Toolbar
Plugins.desc: The Obsidian Editing Toolbar is modified from cmenu, which provides more powerful customization settings and has many built-in editing commands to be a MS Word-like toolbar editing experience.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Annotations
Plugins.desc: Add a sidebar view for comments and highlights.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Image
Plugins.desc: Enhance the experience of image seamlessly. For example, operations for image in context menu, command palette.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Symbols Prettifier
Plugins.desc: Replace/substitute the symbols with actual symbols you commonly type. It also works for emojis shortcuts, abbreviations, greek letters, math symbols or other snippets/aliases you define

Plugins.name: Entity Linker
Plugins.desc: Link research terms to standard entities

Plugins.name: Extended Task Lists
Plugins.desc: Extended reader view support for task lists, including in-progress and won't do task items.

Plugins.name: File Explorer Note Count
Plugins.desc: The plugin helps you to see the number of notes under each folder within the file explorer.

Plugins.name: File Explorer++
Plugins.desc: Hide and pin files and folders in the file explorer using custom filters, such as wildcards and regex, based on their names, paths, and tags. Additionally, achieve the same with a single click in the file menu.

Plugins.name: File Property Enhancer
Plugins.desc: Improve user experience when using file properties like adding icons or custom display view.

Plugins.name: File Tree Alternative
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows you to have an alternative file tree view.

Plugins.name: Folders to Graph
Plugins.desc: Display your vault folder structure into your graphs.

Plugins.name: GitHub Sync
Plugins.desc: Sync vault to personal GitHub.

Plugins.name: Graph Analysis
Plugins.desc: Analyse your Obsidian graph.

Plugins.name: Header Enhancer
Plugins.desc: Level up your headers, customize your notes. Header Enhancer makes your notes header better and more useful.

Plugins.name: HelpMate
Plugins.desc: Integrating help systems into the Obsidian UI.

Plugins.name: Highlightr
Plugins.desc: A minimal and aesthetically pleasing highlighting menu that makes color-coded highlighting much easier with a configurable assortment of highlight colors üé®.

Plugins.name: HK Code Block
Plugins.desc: Obsidian plugin developed by Heekang Park; Make code block looking good on reading view

Plugins.name: Home tab
Plugins.desc: A browser-like search tab for your local files.

Plugins.name: Homepage
Plugins.desc: Open a specified note, canvas, or workspace on startup, or set it for quick access later.

Plugins.name: Hotkeys++
Plugins.desc: Additional hotkeys to do common things in Obsidian

Plugins.name: Image Converter
Plugins.desc: Convert, compress, resize, annotate, markup, draw, crop, rotate, flip, align images directly in Obsidian. Drag-resize, rename with variables, batch process. WEBP, JPG, PNG, HEIC, TIF.

Plugins.name: Janitor
Plugins.desc: Performs cleanup tasks on the Obsidian vault

Plugins.name: Lineage
Plugins.desc: Edit Markdown in a keyboard-centric Miller columns interface. Inspired by Gingko Writer.

Plugins.name: Link Exploder
Plugins.desc: Link Exploder is a Obsidian plugin that creates a canvas from a note, embedding it's incoming (i.e. backlinks) and outgoing links onto the canvas (as well as the their linked notes).

Plugins.name: Link Tree
Plugins.desc: View file links and backlinks as a recursively expandable, filterable list with editable text, combining the structure of outliners like Dynalist & WorkFlowy with the flexibility of Obsidian.

Plugins.name: Linkify
Plugins.desc: Converts matching text into links.

Plugins.name: Lite Gallery
Plugins.desc: Easily create carousel galleries to better organize/view images in your notes.

Plugins.name: make.md
Plugins.desc: make.md gives you everything you need to organize and personalize your notes.

Plugins.name: Map of Content
Plugins.desc: Automatically generate a Map of Content for your vault

Plugins.name: MathLive
Plugins.desc: Faster and more intuitive MathJax editing using MathLive.

Plugins.name: Mermaid Tools
Plugins.desc: Improved Mermaid.js experience for Obsidian: visual toolbar with common elements & more

Plugins.name: Minitabs
Plugins.desc: Customize a set of nested tabs through code blocks.

Plugins.name: Multi-Column Markdown
Plugins.desc: This plugin adds functionality to create markdown documents with multiple columns of content viewable within Obsidian's preview mode

Plugins.name: New Tab +
Plugins.desc: Allow to open markdown files, graph and canvas in new tab as the default behavior.

Plugins.name: Nexus AI Chat Importer
Plugins.desc: Import conversations from ChatGPT export files.

Plugins.name: Ninja Cursor
Plugins.desc: The plugin which enhance cursor visibility.

Plugins.name: Note Chain
Plugins.desc: Thoughts as river, notes as chain. Add prev and next notes to a notes, and order files by the chain in File Explorer.

Plugins.name: Lookalike
Plugins.desc: Find similar notes based on the frequency of terms within the vault.

Plugins.name: Note Refactor
Plugins.desc: Extract note content into new notes and split notes

Plugins.name: Note Toolbar
Plugins.desc: Add customizable toolbars to your notes.

Plugins.name: Novel word count
Plugins.desc: Displays a word count (and more!) for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.

Plugins.name: Note Linker
Plugins.desc: Automatically find and link notes in Obsidian

Plugins.name: Better Command Palette
Plugins.desc: A command palette that does all of the things you want it to do.

Plugins.name: Core Search Assistant
Plugins.desc: Enhance built-in search: keyboard interface, card preview, bigger preview

Plugins.name: Day Planner
Plugins.desc: A day planner with clean UI and readable syntax

Plugins.name: Dictionary
Plugins.desc: This is a simple dictionary for the Obsidian Note-Taking Tool.

Plugins.name: Divide & Conquer
Plugins.desc: Provides commands for bulk enabling/disabling of plugins. Useful for debugging when you have many plugins.

Plugins.name: Dynamic Highlights
Plugins.desc: Dynamically highlight text based on cursor selection or search query with full regex, mobile, and live preview support

Plugins.name: Emoji Toolbar
Plugins.desc: Quickly search for and insert emojis into your notes.

Plugins.name: Enhancing Export
Plugins.desc: This is a enhancing export plugin for Obsidian. It allows to export to formats like Html, DOCX, ePub and PDF or Markdown(Hugo) etc.

Plugins.name: Enhancing Mindmap
Plugins.desc: This is a enhancing mindmap plugin for Obsidian. You can edit mindmap on markdown.

Plugins.name: Better File Link
Plugins.desc: A plugin to add better external file links to notes.

Plugins.name: Focus Mode
Plugins.desc: Add Focus Mode to Obsidian.

Plugins.name: Folder Index
Plugins.desc: This Plugin will automatically generate a TOC for the current Folder.

Plugins.name: Fullscreen mode plugin
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows viewing a single document in fullscreen focus mode

Plugins.name: Hider
Plugins.desc: Hide UI elements such as tooltips, status, titlebar and more

Plugins.name: Hover Editor
Plugins.desc: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

Plugins.name: HTML Reader
Plugins.desc: This is a HTML file reader plugin for Obsidian. Can open document with ".html" and ".htm" file extensions.

Plugins.name: Iconize
Plugins.desc: Add icons to anything you desire in Obsidian, including files, folders, and text.

Plugins.name: Icons
Plugins.desc: Add icons to your Obsidian notes.

Plugins.name: JSON/CSV Importer
Plugins.desc: This plugin imports a JSON/CSV file (or text block) and creates notes from a Handlebars template file

Plugins.name: Importer
Plugins.desc: Import data from Notion, Evernote, Apple Notes, Microsoft OneNote, Google Keep, Bear, Roam, and HTML files.

Plugins.name: Kanban
Plugins.desc: Create markdown-backed Kanban boards in Obsidian.

Plugins.name: Linter
Plugins.desc: Formats and styles your notes. It can be used to format YAML tags, aliases, arrays, and metadata; footnotes; headings; spacing; math blocks; regular markdown contents like list, italics, and bold styles; and more with the use of custom rule options as well.

Plugins.name: Local File Interface
Plugins.desc: Provides commands for moving files in and out of the vault

Plugins.name: Local Images Plus
Plugins.desc: Local Images Plus plugin searches for all external media links in your notes, downloads and saves them locally and adjusts the links in your notes to point to the saved files.

Plugins.name: Markdown Formatting Assistant
Plugins.desc: This Plugin provides a simple Editor for Markdown, HTML and Colors and in addition a command interface. The command interface facilitate a faster workflow.

Plugins.name: Meta Bind
Plugins.desc: Make your notes interactive with inline input fields, metadata displays, and buttons.

Plugins.name: Mind Map
Plugins.desc: A plugin to preview notes as Markmap mind maps

Plugins.name: Mindmap NextGen
Plugins.desc: View your Markdown as a mindmap

Plugins.name: Minimal Theme Settings
Plugins.desc: Change the colors, fonts and features of Minimal Theme.

Plugins.name: Plugin Groups
Plugins.desc: Manage your Plugins through groups: Enable and disable multiple plugins through a single command, or delay the startup of plugins to speed up your Obsidian start up time.

Plugins.name: Plugin Update Tracker
Plugins.desc: Know when installed plugins have updates and evaluate the risk of upgrading

Plugins.name: Power Search
Plugins.desc: Searches Obsidian and Anki Notes based on current line

Plugins.name: Projects
Plugins.desc: Plain text project planning.

Plugins.name: Regex Find/Replace
Plugins.desc: Find and replace text using regular expressions.

Plugins.name: Related Notes Finder
Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin that adds extra features for finding related notes.

Plugins.name: Relation Pane
Plugins.desc: This plugin displays a panel that summarize relations between notes.

Plugins.name: Smart Links
Plugins.desc: This is a plugin for Obsidian that allows users to define custom link formats

Plugins.name: Style Settings
Plugins.desc: Offers controls for adjusting theme, plugin, and snippet CSS variables.

Plugins.name: TagFolder
Plugins.desc: Show tags as folder

Plugins.name: Tasks
Plugins.desc: Track tasks across your vault. Supports due dates, recurring tasks, done dates, sub-set of checklist items, and filtering.

Plugins.name: ObsidianTweaks
Plugins.desc: Adds some convenient tweaks including improved toggling and ergonomic commands

Plugins.name: Version History Diff
Plugins.desc: Diff the version history of the core Sync and File Recovery plugins and Git. Adds a command to open the core Sync version history as well.

Plugins.name: Wordy
Plugins.desc: Thesaurus, rhymes, alliterations, dictionary and more using the Datamuse API

Plugins.name: BRAT
Plugins.desc: Easily install a beta version of a plugin for testing.

Plugins.name: Strange New Worlds
Plugins.desc: Help see how your vault is interconnected with visual indicators.

Plugins.name: PDF++
Plugins.desc: The most Obsidian-native PDF annotation tool ever.

Plugins.name: Peerdraft
Plugins.desc: Real-time, instant collaboration on Obsidian documents or folders. Whether for quick note-taking or building a team knowledge base, Peerdaft syncs with your collaborators' Obsidian vaults and also offers a Web Editor.

Plugins.name: Pin Enhancer
Plugins.desc: Enhances the pin function to prevent closing the pinned tab.

Plugins.name: Plugin Manager
Plugins.desc: Extends plugin management of Obsidian.MD

Plugins.name: Plugin Reloader
Plugins.desc: Manually reload plugins.

Plugins.name: Plugins Annotations
Plugins.desc: Allows adding personal comments to each installed plugin.

Plugins.name: Project Browser
Plugins.desc: Replaces your new tab window with a browseable list of the files and folders in your vault.

Plugins.name: QuickAdd
Plugins.desc: Quickly add new pages or content to your vault.

Plugins.name: Reading View Enhancer
Plugins.desc: Enhances reading view. Use arrow keys to navigate between blocks or toggle collapse.

Plugins.name: Recent Files
Plugins.desc: List files by most recently opened

Plugins.name: Search++
Plugins.desc: Allow inserting text context search results on the active note, the plugin is based on the plugin mrj-text-expand-witb-text of MrJackphil.

Plugins.name: Settings Management
Plugins.desc: Manage settings options, including show enabled/disabled plugins and css, grid layout, save current plugins/css enable config for quick enable/disable, etc.

Plugins.name: Settings Search
Plugins.desc: Globally search settings in Obsidian.md

Plugins.name: Share my plugin list
Plugins.desc: Share the enabled plugins in list/table format.

Plugins.name: Share Note
Plugins.desc: Instantly share a note, with the full theme and content exactly like you see in Reading View. Data is shared encrypted by default, and only you and the person you send it to have the key.

Plugins.name: Smart Connections
Plugins.desc: Find links to similar notes using artificial intelligence from OpenAI.

Plugins.name: Smart Connections Visualizer
Plugins.desc: View your Smart Connections in a visualized format.

Plugins.name: Super Duper Audio Recorder
Plugins.desc: Records audio directly, with input device and folder configuration, similar to the core one, but better

Plugins.name: Relay
Plugins.desc: Collaborate in real time with live cursors. Create relays, add folders, and manage user access.

Plugins.name: Tab Selector
Plugins.desc: Quickly switch tabs in various ways.

Plugins.name: Advanced Tables
Plugins.desc: Improved table navigation, formatting, manipulation, and formulas

Plugins.name: Tag Wrangler
Plugins.desc: Rename, merge, toggle, and search tags from the tag pane

Plugins.name: Task list
Plugins.desc: Enable better task management via lists.

Plugins.name: Templater
Plugins.desc: Create and use templates

Plugins.name: Theme Picker
Plugins.desc: Quickly preview installed themes

Plugins.name: Translate
Plugins.desc: Translate text and notes with Google Translate, DeepL, Azure, and more.

Plugins.name: Typing Assistant
Plugins.desc: Support multiple shortcut menus to improve input efficiency

Plugins.name: Typing Transformer
Plugins.desc: Improved, configurable auto formatting as typing

Plugins.name: UNITADE.md
Plugins.desc: Effortlessly treat any file extension as note, organize diverse file formats in your vault and take advancements in control of extension system even with custom modals.

Plugins.name: VARE
Plugins.desc: Now you can easily manage your plugins and themes. Simply select the version you want or install unlisted versions from GitHub. You can also install beta version and switch back if necessary.

Plugins.name: Vault Explorer
Plugins.desc: Explore your vault in visual format

Plugins.name: Vault Full Statistics
Plugins.desc: Status bar item with vault full statistics such as number of notes, files, attachments, links, tags and quality of vault.

Plugins.name: Vault Transfer
Plugins.desc: Copies a note, and pastes it into another vault.

Plugins.name: Vertical Tabs
Plugins.desc: Offer an alternative view that displays open tabs vertically, allowing users to group and organize tabs for a better navigation experience.

Plugins.name: Voice
Plugins.desc: Let your notes talk and speak to you and enhance your Obsidian experience to effortlessly listen to your notes being read aloud and enjoy the power of sound, audio, and speech.

Plugins.name: Workspaces Plus
Plugins.desc: Quickly switch and manage workspaces

Plugins.name: Mousewheel Image zoom
Plugins.desc: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling

Plugins.name: Image Toolkit
Plugins.desc: This plugin provides some image viewing toolkit.

Plugins.name: Emoji Autocomplete
Plugins.desc: Smart suggestions when typing emoji shortcodes & more! :star:

Plugins.name: Emoji Titler
Plugins.desc: This plugin is emoji titler to easily insert an emoji in the title using a keyboard shortcut.
